response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $10,000 to me, reflecting its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $9,500. This price allows us both to find a fair balance, ensuring you receive a substantial return on your perceived value while allowing me to maximize the product's worth. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
